refnamediv.refpurpose: Closes a block of code that begins with an "if...then" statement.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Closes a block of code that begins with an "if...then" statement.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: Any block of code that begins with an "if...then" statement must end with an endif statement.
